basics.name: Tom Kelleher
basics.label: Technologist and Consultant
basics.summary: A Director of Technology, with decades experience driving solution design and delivery. Led two massive upgrades of healthcare web/mobile apps, available to 5M users on 3 continents. A comfortable and personable leader and manager, setting strategic roadmap, synthesizing product and business strategies into stable, impactful systems.

work.summary: Client-facing technical consultancy, creating applications for healthcare, publishing, marketing, law enforcement and more.
highlights: Won and served clientele across healthcare, publishing, marketing, law-enforcement and more -- augmenting/reimagining existing systems; creating zero-to-one new systems.
Created all budgets, project timelines and plans, and drove communication, requirements definition, pain point identification, and proactive expectation management.
Created static and dynamic demos and POCs, presentations, documentation and video summaries to confirm full understanding of business context and aims, and start-to-finish adherence to those aims.
work.name: Tom Kelleher Consulting, Inc.

work.summary: Educational publishing firm, creating encoded books for young readers; rapid-growth startup, achieving $20M+ in three years.
highlights: Spearheaded strategic build/buy vendor assessment for secure file-transfer functionality. Authored use cases, normalized comparison data, validated with stakeholders to simplify final selection.
Planned/Architected/Coded integration and data loading interface for partner systems (Monday, ShipStation, NetSuite) into Tableau; foundation of first-ever strategic product management dashboard.
Created streamlined visualization of complex manual product flow, articulating inputs/outputs to each stage; jump-started collaboration, ideation, research, planning for new Automation team.
work.name: Just Right Reader
work.description: First developer hired to new team hired to automate and streamline customized book publishing process.

work.name: ArenaCX, Inc.
work.summary: Fast-paced startup, creating online marketplace for outsourcing vendors, consultants and SaaS firms.
work.description: Hands-in-the-code developer and department leader, delivering on our expansive Outsourcing Marketplace vision.
highlights: Drove 5-month zero-to-one system design and delivery of our flagship product (RFPerfect), from ideation and design to market launch, coding critical/complex components. Reduces RFPs lifecycle from months to days.

Managed technology and product roadmaps, stack and tech debt, version control, systems ecosystem, and tech vendor relationships -- problem solving and aligning all with strategic initiatives, customer needs, timelines and business goals.

Managed three agile dev teams simultaneously, coding key features, keeping all in sync, to deliver our flagship SaaS product. Reviewed/approved all invoices, negotiated costs and timing, created and managed RFPs.

Managed all IT cloud infrastructure, tooling, technology stack, vendor partnerships, vendor integrations, and knowledge sharing systems. Fit each to firm's vision, budget, strategic initiatives and business goals.

Maintained team and stakeholder confidence via weekly reports, technical demos & presentations, video updates, showcasing progress and solution deliveries; conveying technical concepts with clarity and resonance to varied audiences.

volunteer.summary: Conducted research and experiments leading to numerous patents and innovations.
highlights: Developed the phonograph, a device for recording and reproducing sound.
Invented the motion picture camera, contributing to the birth of the film industry.

education.area: Various fields of science and technology

awards.title: Congressional Gold Medal
awards.summary: Awarded for distinguished achievements and contributions to society.

publications.name: Electric Light and Power
publications.summary: A paper detailing the development and impact of electric light and power systems.

references.name: Henry Ford
references.reference: Thomas Edison was a brilliant inventor and a visionary businessman. His work has had a profound impact on the modern world.
